name: Headphones
content: I need a moment for me and myself
Fixin my headache shut the world out
But I got melodies to solve them
I'm coming up from the bottom
I put my headphones on and go
I put my headphones on and go
I'm not religious but f**k it
The music is making me believe
I'm coming up from the bottom
I put my headphones on and go
I put my headphones on and go
I put my headphones on and go
I put my headphones on and go
I put my headphones on and go
Far away a better place I go
I put my headphones on and go
I put my headphones on and go
I put my headphones on and go
I put my headphones on and go
I put my headphones on and go
